Name: Smokey Joe
Ingredients: 5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with dehydrated apple slice floated on cocktail.
Review: Sake sweetened with Sauternes and flavoured with cognac and Islay whisky.
History: Created in August 2008 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Smokey Joe contains 129 calories
